There are too many colours, so I dumbed down the 16 million HEX colours.

we've listed a curated list of colours that can be created with three charecters, so they are easier to remember

Making decisions on colours had always been difficult. Even more if there are 16 milion of them. This is why I dumbed them down to only 2000 colours. Normaly HEX take up six character from 0-9 and or A-F. Here I made the list of every HEX colour that you could make with only three characters. This got us 4096 (you can see them all here) colour and still we found alot of colours similar to eachother, so we deleted every HEX colour that started with a 1,3,5,7 or 9 and a,c or e and this left us with around 2000 colours.

by Mitchel van Eijgen

with Studio 210
